addCase.document: <case type="someType" id="someId"> <courthouse>someCourtHouse</courthouse><!--Optional:--> <courtroom>someCourtRoom</courtroom><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <defendants><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <defendant>some defendant</defendant> </defendants><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <judges><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <judge>some judge</judge> </judges><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <prosecutors><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <prosecutor>some prosecutor</prosecutor> </prosecutors><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <defenders><!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <defender>some defender</defender> </defenders> </case>
